name: NES Bomberman (incomplete)
description:
BOMBERMAN for the NES entry for the OLC CODEJAM 2019

Due to time constraints, the game really only includes a title screen and a sprite that moves around. 

The download includes SOURCE+BINARY, should run in real hardware and DOES run in the emulator FCEUX. Requires NESASM3 to compile.
